item.title: NCH is roto-translation invariant
item.description: Introduction I have recently started my thesis on 3D surface reconstruction. One way to do so is to basically define a surface as the zero level set of a function $f : \mathbb{R}^3 \to \mathbb{R}$, and then find some way to build this function out of a set of points $\mathcal{P} \subset \mathbb{R}^3$. NCH is one method that allows you to define such a function starting from a point cloud along with their normals, which tell you which way is the inside of the surface.
